thread.title: Guidance: Advice for decision making: staff guide
thread.title_full: Guidance: Advice for decision making: staff guide

title: Guidance: Advice for decision making: staff guide
text:
10 March 2017, see all updates Advice for DWP decision makers on Universal Credit, PIP and contribution-based JSA and ESA for people who are eligible for Universal Credit. This advice for DWP decision makers covers: Universal Credit ( UC ) Personal Independence Payment ( PIP ) contribution-based Jobseeker’s Allowance ( JSA ) and contribution-based Employment and Support Allowance ( ESA ) for people who are eligible for Universal Credit 
The advice in the Decision makers’ guide applies in all other cases. 
Join our mailing list to find out when we update this publication by emailing Why we publish this guide 
We publish this guide to help people understand how we make decisions. Information for claimants
